amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the Murphy Theatre Community Center, Inc. in Wilmington, Ohio.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the Murphy Theatre Community Center, Inc. in Wilmington, Ohio, and reduce the amount of the appropriate section of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 328 (Roll no. 628).
